title: The Accidental Book Club - Jennifer Scott
description:
Jean Vison never expected to run a book club, until her life took an unexpected turn. Now, with JeanÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s husband gone, what began as an off-the-cuff idea has grown into a group of six women who meet the second Tuesday of every month for a potluck supper, for wine and laughterÃ¢â‚¬â€and for books.

ThereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Loretta, who deals with the lack of intimacy in her marriage by diving into erotic novels. Dorothy, whose ruffian sons are a never-ending source of stress. May entertains the group with her outrageous dating stories, while Mitzi finds something political to rant about in every bookÃ¢â‚¬â€including LorettaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s trashy romances. Even Janet, with her mousy shyness and constant blush, has helped Jean rediscover the joy in life.

So when JeanÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s family starts unraveling againÃ¢â‚¬â€her daughter forced into rehab and her troubled teen granddaughter, Bailey, coming to live with her in the interimÃ¢â‚¬â€she turns to the book club for comfort and support. And, together, they all, even Bailey, discover that family is what you make of it, especially the family you chooseÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
